name: Combat Square Online
description:
Players will fight in a turn based game until there is only one survivor.

To play, connect to the server with a nickname and then create a lobby with a code. Have your friends join the lobby using that code. 

After the game has started players will have four combat choices each with different effects. For example Melee does the most damage, but if your target blocks you take damage instead. Mage does the least damage but does extra on an opponent who is blocking.

The player health can be customized by the host.

This is my first online multiplayer game! Please enjoy.
